you can try purging XUL.mfasl from the firefox profile.
in your home directory there is a directory containing your current firefox settings and temporary files. It is like : .mozilla/firefox/2shuf1vi.default/
inside this directory there is a file XUL.mfasl you can safely remove (temp work file recreated upon firefox restart)
